An amazing sci-fi puzzler. Despite its short playtime, this game is truly polished and immersive. Loads of lore to find out about as well if you're interested in that sort of thing. Portal is an experience you can't pass up.

Good game overall, there were some bugs that made the game harder to play like the floating cubes that wouldn't press down buttons and the companion cube not spawning at first, but still very enjoyable.

LOVE THIS GAME
Great puzzle game. Expertly crafted simple yet challenging puzzles. Hilarious commentary by GLaDOS. Overall, a really great experience.

Please buy this game. For the stupid low prices this game goes on sale for its well worth your money. Don';t even consider not picking it up!
Enjoy!
Going in and out of portals gives me seizures.
ONE OF THE ALL TIME BEST GAMES EVER!

Portal is a Valve classic, and one that definitely holds up today. It's a first person puzzle/thriller game that has this... unnerving tone to it. The puzzles are challenging yet super rewarding, and the mechanics feel natural and are always a blast to mess around with. Overall, amazing game.
IM IN LOVE THIS IS AMAZING!! DOWNLOAD IT

Awesome game worth the money
ta weno me gusto la parte donde vomite de las nauseas por jugar demasiado con los portales

Charming, clever, funny and a bit short. Portal still holds upup pretty well after all these years and it shows why it was important to it's genre. Buy it on sale (it goes on pretty often) but remember 
The cake is indeed a lie.
Juego realmente entretenido, no he parado de jugarlo hasta que me lo he terminado, me ha gustado mucho personalmente y seguramente me compre el portal 2
GLaDOS, where's my cake, did you put it in the Aperture Science Intelligence Incinerator?
amazing
Super super fun even for an old game. It's short and fairly simple but still really enjoyable. Great lead in to the second game.
It's Portal, what else is there to say?
